alert.note: Alert for Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 3:40PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Nassau, central Baker, central Duval and south central Charlton Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 340 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Macclenny, or 19 miles southwest of Callahan, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Callahan, Jacksonville International Arpt, Cisco Gardens, Nassau Village-Ratliff, Ratliff, Bryceville, Baldwin, Tallyrand and Whitehouse Air Field. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
